pfp.png: Sam's profile picture on most platforms. A heavily edited photo of her with green and pink distortions.
hexgloop/titlecard.png: A pixel art title card for HexGloop. 'Hex' is in a mystical amethyst font. 'Gloop' is in a slimy green font.
quatalog/icon.png: The Quatalog Icon. A three by three grid of circles colored in a 'Q' shape.
mcmodmisc/hexaddonsicon.png: The Hex Additions page icon. A purple space filling curve on a hexagonal grid with eyes.
typography/BenchFinal.png: A heavily edited image of a bench with wavy text reading 'is anyone listening' repeated across the background
typography/benchoriginal.png: A photo of a bench in front of a building at night.
